contents:
Maybe I should take that back.
I'm sincerely sorry if that hurts your feeling.

Thanks for taking that back. Well for me, you did not hurt my feeling, but I would have been hurt if someone said something like that to me.
Ultimately, everyone can only control his/her own behavior. Don't worry about Mephisto, or anyone else. Like Carl said, take a break.
Also, I want to apologize if I accidentally made the tension worse. That was not my intention. I will refrain from speaking on this subject. See, maybe I should take a break too. :)

Hopefully the next time I leave a comment, it is in one of your new posts, not related to this.
Best wishes to you.
